pr_title: [CALCITE-3941] Add the default strict mode to the path in the Json functions

timeline.bodyText: What does pathWff mean? Should we change it to a more clearer name?
timeline.author: chunweilei

timeline.bodyText: What if there is an illegal mode? For instance, json_exists('{\"foo\":\"bar\"}', "strictxx $.foo' false on error). Will it throw exception?
timeline.author: chunweilei

replies.bodyText:
false on error

The exception was handled and returned as false.
replies.author: XuQianJin-Stars
